name: deep-research-plus
description: Advanced research plugin: deep web research + GDELT geopolitical analysis

metadata.description: Combines diffusion-based deep research with specialized geopolitical analysis. Includes: general research agents (research-worker, gap-detector, research-orchestrator), geopolitical specialists (conflict-analyst, sanctions-researcher, actor-mapper, sentiment-tracker, trend-analyst), two skills (/deep-research, /geo-research), and GDELT MCP server.

plugins.name: deep-research-plus
plugins.description: Deep web research + GDELT geopolitical analysis with 9 agents, 2 skills, and MCP server
